attributes.action: Allow all UK citizens to vote in any further Scottish Independence Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: At present Scottish MP's are allowed to vote in the UK Parliament on decisions that effect the whole of the UK. Surely it would be fair therefore, in a decision that effects the whole of Britain, all of Britain should be allowed to have their say.
attributes.background: Since the EU vote, the Scottish Parliament is pushing for another Independence Referendum. If Scotland were to leave the UK it would have an effect on all UK citizens.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/138467
